snippet: One week after a lawsuit by livery and black-car operators challenging the use of such apps was dismissed, the Uber company said its service was available.
abstract: New York City’s yellow taxi riders can now, for first time, legally hail a cab with smartphone app; company called Uber, which entered yellow taxi-hailing market in 2012, says its service is available, one week after lawsuit challenging use of such apps was dismissed.
lead_paragraph: One week after a lawsuit by livery and black-car operators challenging the use of such apps was dismissed, the Uber company said its service was available.

headline.seo: Uber Company’s App for Hailing Yellow Taxis Is Available in New York
headline.main: Company’s App Can Now Be Used to Hail Yellow Cabs in City
headline.print_headline: Company’s App Can Now Be Used to Hail Cabs in City
